E

EchoClient - Class in stream
EchoClient is the instance of a client The CLientThread is composed of: A Socket that contains the message. A BufferedReader that reads the message inside the socket. A PrintStream that writes the message inside the socket and sends it to the other user A pseudo that identifies the user A diffusion list of clientThreads to identify all the clientThreads that we are sending messages to A MainPage that represents the view of the application A booleanThat is unused
EchoClient(Socket, String, MainPage) - Constructor for class stream.EchoClient
class constructor.
EchoServerMultiThreaded - Class in stream
EchoServerMultiThreaded is created when the application is launched.
EchoServerMultiThreaded(ServerSocket) - Constructor for class stream.EchoServerMultiThreaded
Default class constructor.
enterMessage() - Method in class stream.MainPage
Creates the text field to write messages, configures its listener.
